TopicTitle: What Do YOU Want To See First?

Articles.Content: What new features do you want to see implemented in Kerbal Space Program first. I would like to see Bill, Jeb, and Bob in orange EVA suits more than anything first off.

Really? You would choose that over new planets, or atmospheric effects, or cargo bays, or new science experiments, or the implementation of money, or an asteroid belt, or mining, or...

(as I type this I realize there's a mod for almost all of it, orange suits included)

Boring as it sounds, I think vanilla KSP could use more parts. Especially fairings, robotics, cargo bays, etc.

Then, I'd like to see some kind of incentive for establishing permanent bases in various biomes.

Really? You would choose that over new planets, or atmospheric effects, or cargo bays, or new science experiments, or the implementation of money, or an asteroid belt, or mining, or...

(as I type this I realize there's a mod for almost all of it, orange suits included)

Really that is just what I want to begin with.

Biomes. Just biomes on every body in KSP. They make game much better imo.

(as I type this I realize there's a mod for almost all of it, orange suits included)

Orange suits for the magic trio only? Link pls.
A better and explained science gathering system as well as REAL TIME readouts for science parts.

I'd like to see a little adjustment to the physics if the engine allows it. I think the stiffness of the connections between parts needs to be way higher. The connection between parts is strong enough, but the joints flex too much. They should be way stiffer. This would fix the floppy rocket problems too.

I'd like to see a little adjustment to the physics if the engine allows it. I think the stiffness of the connections between parts needs to be way higher. The connection between parts is strong enough, but the joints flex too much. They should be way stiffer. This would fix the floppy rocket problems too.

Well, until that comes, there is a mod for that: Kerbal Joint Reinforcement

There are many things I'd like to see. Maybe larger fuel tanks and engines, maybe more SRBs (Considering there are only 2 of them. *not including the separation boosters*)

I really really want to be able to interact inside of the space crafts. I mean, maybe be able to move around inside. What about more space plane wings, and more cockpits and things of the like.
basically what they say will come in 23 and moar!!!!!
I would be fully satisfied with what they plans for 0.23 which sound quite a lot by the way. Good luck Devs !
